alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Ritchie (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms and heavy rain will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun, southeastern Ritchie, southwestern Doddridge and Gilmer Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Glenville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenville, Cedar Creek State Park, Sand Fork, Auburn, Smithville, Baldwin, Stouts Mills, Grove, Leopold, Troy, Newberne, Coxs Mills, Linn, Berea, Tanner, Cedarville, Normantown and Burnt House. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
